name: Simple DS Series Vol. 18: The Soukou Kihei Gun Ground
name_original: Simple DS Series Vol. 18: The Soukou Kihei Gun Ground
description:
Simple DS Series Vol. 18: The Soukou Kihei Gun Ground is an action-shooter game developed by RideonJapan, RideonJapan,Inc and RideonJapan,Inc.. It came out on 26-07-2007. D3 Publisher published the game.
You can play Simple DS Series Vol. 18: The Soukou Kihei Gun Ground on Nintendo DS.
